heading.title: Design meets performance
heading.subtitle: A snapshot of my work crafting fast, intuitive interfaces

paragraphs: From sleek, user-focused interfaces to robust front-end architecture, these projects showcase my journey as a full-stack developer with a passion for crafting engaging digital experiences. Each piece reflects my focus on performance, usability, and thoughtful design.

heading.headline: Infinite Nonogram
heading.title: Endless Logic Puzzle Challenge
heading.subtitle: Smart, adaptive gameplay on any device

paragraphs: A responsive, grid-based puzzle game built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features dynamic level generation and real-time state management for smooth, infinite gameplay.
